title: How to start the introduction of a fictional character in my novel - Quora

response.answer_text: Put that fictional character in some type of scene of conflict, and show that person’s reaction to it and how they go about solving the problem they are in. No need to describe physical characteristics at the start, or even ever, for that matter. Show the inner narrative and thoughts of that POV character. If it is not a main character, describe them in their relation to the main character or the plot itself—why are they on your stage?
